title: Smart data Models - DeviceSoC schema
description: Common definitions to describe Device and Device Model schemas

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Device

id.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

ipAddress.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. List of IP address of the device. It can be a comma separated list of values if the device has more than one IP address

refCorp.description: RelationShip. Corp Identifier format of any NGSI entity where Device is fitted

refEndPoints.description: RelationShip. EndPoint Identifier format of any NGSI entity provide data to device
